## SchemaEnforcement enum

[Schema enforcement levels](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/configuration/schema#_enforcement) for the embedded policy decision point (PDP) server.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare enum SchemaEnforcement 
```

## Enumeration Members

<table><thead><tr><th>

Member


</th><th>

Value


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

NONE


</td><td>

`"none"`


</td><td>

The embedded PDP server will not check whether inputs match the JSON schemas specified in the policies.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

REJECT


</td><td>

`"reject"`


</td><td>

The embedded PDP server will check whether inputs match the JSON schemas specified in the policies, and deny actions if there are validation errors.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

WARN


</td><td>

`"warn"`


</td><td>

The embedded PDP server will check whether inputs match the JSON schemas specified in the policies, and include any validation errors in the response.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
